description.message: Increment [+] a URL or go to the Next [>] Page; Supports Auto & Download Incrementing & Infinite Scrolling

title.description: Extension title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

increment_decrement_h3.message: Select the part of the URL to Increment [+] or Decrement [-]

multi_button.message: Multi - Click to increment up to 3 parts of the URL

custom_urls_h3.message: Enter a list of custom URLs separated by commas, spaces, or line breaks

custom_urls_textarea.message: URLs must include a scheme (i.e. "http://www.google.com", not "www.google.com")

toolkit_instructions.message: Select and configure a tool then click on the Incrementing Robot to have the work performed.

auto_wait_label.message: Wait for the page to fully load

auto_badge_label.message: Show times left in the icon badge

auto_eta_day.message: Over a Day (You sure about this?!)

download_preview_blocked.message: Sorry, please wait a few more seconds ... scanning this page for URLs is either taking a really long time or URLI is not allowed to check for downloads on this page (e.g. chrome:// pages). Please try disabling and re-enabling Download again in the Options to make sure URLI has <all_urls> permissions.

download_help_extensions_title.message: These are the file extensions found on the page based on the URLs. If the URL doesn't contain the extension in it (e.g. .jpg), URLI won't find it. Important: Since these extensions are based only on the URL Strings (not the actual files), it's not guaranteed to be the file's true type.

download_help_tags_title.message: These are the HTML tags (e.g. ) that were found on the page.

download_help_attributes_title.message: These are the HTML tag attributes (e.g.

download_help_selector_title.message: This lets you directly use JavaScript's querySelectorAll() method on the entire document. You can use multiple CSS Selectors separated by commas for a more fine-grained selection.

download_help_page_title.message: Remember: This will only download the .html of the web page, unless the URL of the page points directly to a file (e.g. http://www.example.com/001.jpg)

download_optional_help.message: You can use multiple Includes and Excludes by separating them with commas. If you enter a Min/Max MB (decimal numbers are acceptable), URLI will attempt to cancel the download as soon as the file size is known and if it doesn't match the size you enter. If the file size can't be determined, the download will commence.

selection_notalphanumeric_error.message: Selection can only contain alphanumeric characters

selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection has to be part of the URL

selection_toolarge_error.message: Selection is too large; please select a smaller number or fewer characters

selection_base_error.message: Select a higher base to match characters in selection

selectionstart_invalid_error.message: Selection position must be from URL

interval_invalid_error.message: Interval has to be between 1 and Max

error_skip_invalid_error.message: Error Skip has to be between 0 and 100

toolkit_invalid_error.message: Toolkit configuration missing tool, action, or quantity

toolkit_open_tabs_too_many_open_error.message: Too many tabs are open in this window (current tabs + quantity exceeds 100), please close some or open a new window

toolkit_open_tabs_quantity_error.message: Toolkit Open Tabs Quantity must be between 1 and 100

toolkit_generate_links_quantity_error.message: Toolkit Generate URLS Quantity must be between 1 and 10000

auto_next_prev_error.message: To use Next [>] Prev [<] with Auto, please first enable Enhanced Mode in Options to give URLI permissions

auto_times_invalid_error.message: Auto Times must be between 1 and 1000

auto_seconds_invalid_error.message: Auto Seconds must be between 1 and 3600

auto_eta_toohigh_error.message: Auto ETA needs to be less than 1 Day

auto_download_seconds_error.message: When using Auto with Download, seconds must be at least 5

auto_download_repeat_error.message: When using Auto with Download, repeat can't be checked

download_enabled_error.message: Please first enable Download in Options to give URLI permissions

f_shortcuts_description.message: F. (or Favorite) Shortcuts are an extra set of shortcuts that will only work on your favorite websites you save or ones you enable in Setup. You can assign easier 1-Key shortcuts (e.g. just ArrowRight) without modifiers or a Mouse Button that will only work on these sites.

help_quick_shortcuts.message: If Quick is enabled, you can Increment [+] or perform other actions instantly without having to enter Setup

chrome_shortcuts_p1.message: URLI is currently set to use Chrome Shortcuts.

chrome_shortcuts_p2.message: Chrome Shortcuts support limited keys, but you can enable URLI's Internal Shortcuts to use any key or mouse button you want! (requires permissions)

internal_shortcuts_p.message: URLI is currently set to use its internal shortcuts! Click on the text boxes and press the key(s) you'd like to set. Alt, Ctrl, Shift, and Meta keys can be used. Left/Middle/Right Mouse Buttons can also be set as shortcuts.

one_click_buttons_p.message: Accessing URLI's buttons requires 2 clicks, but you can add 1-Click buttons to your toolbar! They use 0 Chrome memory when inactive! It's a win-win!

one_click_buttons_increment.message: 1-Click URL Increment Button for URLI (Chrome Web Store)

one_click_buttons_decrement.message: 1-Click URL Decrement Button for URLI (Chrome Web Store)

icon_feedback_enable_label.message: Enable icon feedback when incrementing or from other actions

popup_open_setup_label.message: When Popup UI opens, automatically jump to URL Setup

popup_settings_can_overwrite_label.message: Allow Popup UI settings to overwrite these settings

profile_settings_p.message: Save your favorite URLs' settings such as selection and interval so you can use Quick Shortcuts when you visit them again without having to enter Setup!

profile_settings_none_p.message: Aw, you haven't saved any URL Profiles yet. Why not? Just check the Save box at the top of the Setup window before clicking Accept to start saving!

profile_how_save.message: Important: Your privacy and how URLs are saved

profile_how_save_title.message: To ensure your data is as private as possible, URLI encrypts the URLs you save in storage with what's known in cryptography as "hashes" and "salts." Even URLI can't see the URLs you save!

profile_preselect_label.message: Always preselect the Save checkbox in Setup

increment_decrement_settings_p.message: Change the way URLI pre-selects the number to increment and other options. You can set a couple of these options in the Popup UI too.

selection_option_prefixes.message: Select numbers in the URL with prefixes like page=1

selection_option_lastnumber.message: Select the last number in the URL

selection_option_firstnumber.message: Select the first number in the URL

selection_option_custom.message: Use a custom JavaScript regular expression

selection_custom_url_label.message: Test URL String (Required, note this is saved)

selection_custom_help_label.message: For more testing and help, use

selection_custom_matchgroup_error.message: Match found, but not in group entered

selection_custom_matchindex_error.message: Match found, but not in index entered

error_skip_description.message: URLI can check if the next URL will return an HTTP error code (like 404) and increment again, skipping it up to 100 times. Example: You increment from page=1 to get to page=2, but 2, 3, and 4 are all actually 404s. URLI will skip past those bad pages to the next good one, page=5 automatically. If an error is encountered, URLI's icon will flash with the error code (or flash "RED" for redirects). Set it to 0 to disable it. Important: This will make a request to the server each time to check the status code, and setting this value too high might cause the server to issue a "Too Many Requests" response. A value of 10 or less should be reasonably OK. Also, Please Note: Using this with Auto or the Popup/1-Click Buttons requires Enhanced Mode.

next_prev_settings_p.message: Some URLs may not have numbers, so URLI can increment using Next Prev links on the page. To use Next Prev with Auto, enable Enhanced Mode below.

next_prev_links_priority_innerHTML_optio.message: Prefer links with inner HTML like "Next" in them

next_prev_popup_buttons_description_labe.message: Show Next Prev buttons (Requires Enhanced Permissions)

scroll_settings_p.message: Welcome to the next level of incrementing... Experimental.

auto_settings_p.message: Relax and let URLI auto-increment! Start Auto anytime by toggling it in the UI. Supports multiple tabs at the same time, pause/resume, and repeat.

download_disable_p.message: This isn't just any downloader! Use it with Auto to create an Auto Incrementer Downloader! Click the button to enable (grant permissions).

download_enable_p.message: Download is now enabled! Start Downloading anytime by toggling the "DL" in the Popup UI.

download_settings_disclaimer.message: Before downloading, please open your Browser Settings and make sure the "Ask where to save each file" is unchecked and you've set a Download location!

download_experimental_disclaimer.message: Remember: Download is still an experimental feature! Please only use it for small and simple downloading tasks while incrementing.

enhanced_mode_enable_p.message: Enhanced Mode is now enabled! You can now use Next/Prev and Error Skipping with Auto and Popup/1-Click Buttons.

enhanced_mode_disable_p.message: Enhanced Mode lets you use both Next/Prev and Error Skipping with Auto and Popup/1-Click Buttons. Click the button to enable (grant permissions).

email_a.message: Contact - Please Send Feedback or Report Bugs

urli_thank_you_rainbow.message: Thank you for using URLI, a URL Incrementer

urli_thank_you_wish.message: URLI loves incrementing for you and wishes you an Incrementful Day!
